pageContext.claim: “We were getting ready for a big celebration. We -- we were winning everything -- and all of a sudden it was just called off.”
pageContext.analysis: Networks had not made a final call on states with outstanding votes but all signs pointed to a solid Biden victory. In fact, the results aligned with Trump campaign internal polling. The president was consistently down in Pennsylvania, Arizona was going to be a squeaker, he would lose Michigan and though he would win Florida, that would not be enough for him to win 270 electoral college votes.
